content.raw:
No, I wasn't that ambitious :).  I was just trying to get some of the more common things tested.  In particular, since I was messing with GetElement/HasElement, I figured I should at least have a bit of unit testing in it.  Also, I'll be changing Param.cc in a later PR, so I figured increased testing on the next layer up would be valuable for that.

What do you think?  Should I aim for a lot more coverage?

No, I wasn't that ambitious :). I was just trying to get some of the more common things tested. In particular, since I was messing with GetElement/HasElement, I figured I should at least have a bit of unit testing in it. Also, I'll be changing Param.cc in a later PR, so I figured increased testing on the next layer up would be valuable for that.

What do you think? Should I aim for a lot more coverage?
